body: its been a while since ntr has made me feel sad

poster.username: A V E P A R T H E

body: I always chuckle at the stupidity of hentai, but alas, they just need a barely (sometimes impossibly) believable plot to make two characters have sex. Either raise a complaint about rape, get expelled for the blackmailing evidence being spreaded out, take bloody revenge or just move on, ffs. Netorare is not even funny, interesting or heart-wrecking anymore...
